channel.title: Next Gen on Stats On the T
channel.description: Recent content in Next Gen on Stats On the T

item.title: Is the Changing of the Guard Coming?
item.description: The Next Gen have been center stage throughout the Sunshine Masters this year. How can we size up the success of the young guns? And what does their success mean for the rest of the 2018 season?

item.title: Is Tiafoe's win in Delray Beach only the beginning?
item.description: One of the more interesting ATP results this February was 20-year-old Francis Tiafoe’s title win at Delray Beach. What should we expect from Tiafoe after his first tour-level trophy at such a young age?

item.title: Most Surprising Runs in Men's Open Era
item.description: In this guest post, Martin Ingram explores the stats behind surprising runs in tennis.

item.title: Match Dominance Among Next Gen
item.description: The US hard court season has been a breakout period for the ATP tour’s Next Gen players. In this post we look at which Next Gen players have been the most dominant this season.
